name: Celestial Raid
description:
Celestial Raid is a vertical shmup created using Game Maker. It is a blend of old-school shmup with occasional bullet-hell elements. This game is a prototype and can be finished in a short time (roughly 30-45 minutes). 

Currently Features:
  • 6 missions with 6 bosses.
  • 2 upgrades for your ship.
  • 60 fps gameplay.
Controls:

Move:  Arrow keys.

Confirm: Enter key.

Shoot: X key.

Bomb: C key.

Development progress available at facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/ebwcgames/ and instagram https://www.instagram.com/ebwcgames/

Assets of the game are taken from opengameart.org/.
